channel.title: Angeals Buster Sword {Showoff V1.3}
channel.description:
Alright, well since Moparisthebest's database went down and this topic was lost, im re-posting it. Yes i have checked.
[size=24pt]IF YOU SO FAR AS CLICKED ON THIS TOPIC, COMMENT[/size]
V1: [img]http://programas.site11.com/Upload/uploads/1259869687.png[/img] [img]http://programas.site11.com/Upload/uploads/1259833246.png[/img] [img]http://programas.site11.com/Upload/uploads/1259791248.png[/img]
V1.3: [img]http://programas.site11.com/Upload/uploads/1259810596.png[/img] [img]http://programas.site11.com/Upload/uploads/1259828761.png[/img] [img]http://programas.site11.com/Upload/uploads/1259838046.png[/img]
@V1.3 Pic#3 - Yes, i know part of the hilt has a little bit too many faces in that small area. I will be working on narrowing that down a bit.

item.title: Angeals Buster Sword {Showoff V1.3}
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:317135”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=413676.msg3047729#msg3047729 date=1259883091]

Well everbody, i will not be modeling for Moparscape anymore, it seems people like traces with a junk mesh rather than Primitives with a GREAT mesh/quality. Being i will only be working with Primitives for now on, i will be quitting on modeling for moparscape. Good luck to you up-comming modelers.

Yea, mopars going down hill. i completely understand why you’re leaving.
[/quote]

The modelling section has been good recently, lots of good work, but this ‘primitive’ modelling has to be stopped.
People mention it like primitive modelling is a bad thing, “pretty good for a primitive” etc.

It’s not bad if you know how to do it, I might write up a tutorial and do a few videos on my primitive-tracing method, fairly easy, but creates a nice mesh and clean shape.
I mean, this ain’t all that bad is it?
http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll63/Silent_CJ/Wiref.png[/quote]
well, i can see flaws to it but this isnt the place to debate them. if you want any criticism i can help ya there.

Read full topic

The modelling section has been good recently, lots of good work, but this ‘primitive’ modelling has to be stopped.
People mention it like primitive modelling is a bad thing, “pretty good for a primitive” etc.

It’s not bad if you know how to do it, I might write up a tutorial and do a few videos on my primitive-tracing method, fairly easy, but creates a nice mesh and clean shape.
I mean, this ain’t all that bad is it?

item.title: Angeals Buster Sword {Showoff V1.3}
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

if you’ve read what i said maybe you wouldnt say that ;]
i said there was “too big of a diference” of coarse there was, but not too much,
anyways, keep it up

Read full topic

item.title: Angeals Buster Sword {Showoff V1.3}
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

WhiteWolves:

there’s not THAT big of a diference from the other one, but still, keep working on it ^^

If you notice, the tip of the blade is now more fashioned with the rest of the blade. Also, where there is supposed to be holes, there is now holes. Black peice now shows throughout the hilt like its supposed to. If you acually look at it, there is a difference.

Read full topic
